alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 8:08PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. So far, around 6 to 8 inches of snow has fallen. Additional snowfall accumulations of 6 to 10 inches is expected across the northern portion of the range including Union Pass. South Pass will see an additional 2 to 4 inches of snow. * WHERE...Western Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Thursday. Moderate snow will again break out after midnight tonight, with heavy snow possible Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a tenth of a mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.
